title: Hard Rock Cafe International (N.J.) Inc. and Boardwalk 1000, LLC as single/joint employers
summary: This case involves allegations against Hard Rock Cafe International (N.J.) Inc. and Boardwalk 1000, LLC as single/joint employers for various unfair labor practices, including refusal to bargain, coercive rules, and retaliation for concerted activities. The case is currently open and assigned to Region 04 (Philadelphia, PA).
allegations: 8(a)(5) Refusal to Bargain/Bad Faith Bargaining (including surface bargaining/direct dealing)
8(a)(1) Coercive Statements (Threats, Promises of Benefits, etc.)
